message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in both our interests while there's still a decent amount to split.
Your offer was a bit too greedy, Alice. Let's be fairer and split the pot more evenly this time.  Time is money, after all.
Bob, let's be pragmatic.  My offer is still the best you'll get - the pot shrinks faster for you than for me. Don't get greedy.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now. It's the fairest deal and any more delays will only hurt us both.
